definitions.definition: Advertising or other activity designed to rouse public interest in something.
Public interest attracted in this way.
The condition of being the object of public attention.
The quality of being public, not private.

main_definition: Advertising or other activity designed to rouse public interest in something.
secondary_definitions: Public interest attracted in this way.
The condition of being the object of public attention.
The quality of being public, not private.
